    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2916</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">End of the Year</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ende des Jahres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fin de l'année</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fim do ano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conclusione dell'anno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέλος του έτους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Final del año</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online interactive unit about the end of the school year and plans for the summer vacation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">leisure time</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über das Ende
des Schuljahres und der Pläne für die Sommerferien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité interactive en ligne au sujet de la 
fin de l'année scolaire et des plans pour les vacances d'été.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade interativa em linha sobre o fim do 
ano e das plantas de escola para as férias do verão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità interattiva in linea circa la 
conclusione dell'anno scolastico e dei programmi per la vacanza di 
estate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση διαλογική μονάδα για το 
τέλος του σχολικού έτους και των σχεδίων για τις θερινές 
διακοπές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad interactiva en línea sobre el final 
del año escolar y de los planes para las vacaciones del verano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
